column4: i am unable to uninstall google earth,i get a message in terminal that its not installed
how did you install it?
you have to find out what ubuntu tweaks does then :/
login at tty1, create a new user, determine if you can login with the new user using gdm
there is no option for selecting GNOME or KDE , only tty1 is where i can login
ok, did you do what I said?
the screen that appears after ubuntu logo is a console screen
so you do not see gdm at all?
nope
check /var/log/Xorg.0.log
what is command to open a file in console?
you can use "less"
less xorg.o.log is that correct?

your link just tells me about someone buying a card on ebay.  Later in that thread though, someone says the STA driver is working.  Does the STA driver available in System -> Administration -> Software Sources not work for you?
no, give the whole path with the correct capitalization
what is the command to open a file in console window,pls give an example?
less /path/to/file
ok
is there a specific thing i should look for in xorg.log?
there's no such thing as xorg.log.  It's /var/log/Xorg.0.log .  Capitalization is important.  You should probably pastebin it and include it in your problem description

your link just tells me about someone buying a card on ebay.  Later in that thread though, someone says the STA driver is working.  Does the STA driver available in System -> Administration -> Software Sources not work for you?
